properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, FC.FOOD_NAME, B.GOOD, B.CREATE_DATE, M.USERID, M.POINT FROM BOARD B JOIN BMEMBER M USING (USERNO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON (B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN FOOD_BOARD FB USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN F_CATEGORY FC ON (FC.FOOD_CATEGORY = fb.food_category) WHERE c.category_no = 3 AND FB.DETAIL_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY GOOD DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, FC.FOOD_NAME, B.GOOD, B.BAD, B.REPORT, B.CREATE_DATE, M.USERID, M.POINT, FB.ADDRESS, B.USERNO FROM BOARD B JOIN BMEMBER M ON (B.USERNO = M.USERNO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON (B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN FOOD_BOARD FB USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN F_CATEGORY FC ON (FC.FOOD_CATEGORY = fb.food_category) WHERE c.category_no = 3 AND FB.DETAIL_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ?

INSERT ALL INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO,USERNO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, 3, ?, ?) INTO FOOD_BOARD (BOARD_NO,FOOD_CATEGORY,ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, SEQ_FCNO.NEXTVAL,?) INTO F_CATEGORY VALUES (SEQ_FCNO.CURRVAL, ?) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO,USERNO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, 3, ?, ?) INTO FOOD_BOARD (BOARD_NO,FOOD_CATEGORY,ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?) SELECT * FROM DUAL
UPDATE BOARD SET GOOD = GOOD + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BAD = BAD + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_CONDITION SET BLOCK_C = BLOCK_C + 1 WHERE USERNO = ?
